question.title: Cannot find class dependencies using jdeps for JDK 16, 17, 21
question.body:
I have created a Java module and packaged it in test.jar. It contains test.Main.class. I am able to run this module using the command:

java --module-path test.jar --module test/test.Main

I am also able to run jdeps on the test.jar:

jdeps --module-path test.jar

However, when I run:

jdeps -cp test.jar test.Main

I get this message and no other output:

"Warning: Path does not exist: test.Main"

Also, I tried the same command with jdeps from my Java 8 installation and it works fine. But it does not work with JDK 16, 17, and 21. Any idea why?

Basically, I am just trying to find out the dependencies of test.Main class. Can't I do that with the current jdeps?
